quote_first: The plane swung around onto the take-off runway at 7:51, its jets revving before it moved slowly forward, then gathered speed. The wheels left the ground at
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: “Help me. You’ve got to help me.” The woman’s voice quavered on the edge of tears. The duty constable who had picked up the phone heard a hiccuping gulp, as if the caller was struggling to speak.
title: A Place of Execution
author: Val McDermid
